name: Phillip Whittlesea
body:
### About Me
- **Name:** Phillip "GingerPhill" Whittlesea 
- **Age:** 23
- **Degree:** MEng Computer Science
- **Career:** Software Developer [@sflakesoftware](http://twitter.com/sflakesoftware)

After graduating from The University of Southampton with a 1st class MEng Computer Science degree, I wandered into a career at [Snowflake Software](http://snowflakesoftware.com).

In short, by day I develop Java applications, by night I write all the things you can find on my Github page!

When not shoulder deep in my work, my FZS600 keeps me busy...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
